mapper.select: select id, detection_time as detectionTime, camera_location as cameraLocation, detection_x as detectionX, detection_y as detectionY, detection_w as detectionW, detection_h as detectionH, gender, age from record
select gender,count(gender) as count from record group by gender
select detection_time as detectionTime,count(1) as count from record where detection_time=(SELECT MAX(detection_time) FROM record)
